ExternalData.Titlesect: Agreement establishing the Asian Coconut Community

TreatyText.Label: Text
TreatyText.Text: United Nations, Treaty Series, vol. 684, p. 163; vol. 803, p. 514 [amendment to article 11 (2)]and depositary notification C.N.302.1980.TREATIES-1 of 29 October 1980 [amendment to article 5 (3)]. <superscript>1</superscript>

TreatyNote.Text: The Agreement was drawn up at the meeting of the Inter-Governmental Consultations on the Asian Coconut Community, held at the headquarters of the Economic Commission for Asia and the Far East in Bangkok from 26 to 28 November 1968, which was attended by the representatives of the Governments of Sri Lanka, India, Indonesia, the Philippines, Singapore and Thailand and of the United Nations Development Programme and the Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations.
